div.p: namaḥ śrīhevajrāya ||
evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajrayoṣidbhageṣu vijahāra ||

sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahṛdaya
bhaṭṭāraka guhyātiguhyataraṃ | aho vajragarbha sādhu sādhu mahākṛpa mahābodhisatva vajrasatvasya mahāsamaya hṛdayaṃ hevajrākhyaṃ śṛṇu ||

lg.l:
vajrasatvaṃ
bhavet kasmāt mahāsatvaṃ bhavet kathaṃ |

abhedyaṃ vajram ity uktaṃ satvaṃ tribhavasyekatā

anayoā prajña

heva
jran tu bhavet kena īdṛśan nāmasaṃgrahaṃ |
hekāreṇa kim ākhyātaṃ vajreṇāpi tathā kimu ||
hekāreṇa mahākaruṇā | vajraṃ prajñā ca bhaṇyate |

prajñopā
yātmakan tantraṃ tan me nigaditaṃ śṛṇu ||
bhāvyaṃ bhaven mahāprājña prājño 'bhāvañ ca parijñāyā |
tadvad dheherukam bhāvyam abhāvañ ca parijñayā |

p.l: vajragarbhovāca || he bhagavāna vajradehe katame nāḍyaḥ ||

bhagavān āha || dvātriṃsan nāḍyaḥ dvātrinsad bodhicittāvahā mahāsukhasthā
madhye trīṇi nāḍyāḥ pradhānāḥ | lalanā rasanā avadhūtī ceti |

lg.l: bhāvakī śekā doṣā viṣṭā ca mātarā |
sarvvarī sītadā coṣmā lalanā avadhūtī rasanā
pramaṇā kṛṣṇavarṇā surūpe sayā mānyā hetudāyikāḥ |
tṛvṛttā ca kaminī gehā caṇḍikā māradārikā ||

parasainyavināśāya khaṭikāsādhanaṃ vakṣye | khaṭikā piṣṭvā pañcāmṛtena kuṭhāracchinnayā sārddhaṃ vaṭikāṃ kārayet | antra mantraḥ | oṁ vajrakarttari
hevajrāya hūṁ 3 phaṭ svāhā || siddhyarthaṃ koṭiñ japet | pūrvasevā lakṣaṃ japet | tāṃ sādhya kamaṇḍalugrīvāṃ veṣṭayet | veṣṭayitvā bhañjayet | sarve śatravaḥ śirohīnā
bhavanti || || vajrakarttarividhiḥ || ||

devāna sphāṭayitukāmena tilakaṃ sādhanīyaṃ | brahmabīja puṣyasādhitaṃ kuṭhārachinnāmiśritaṃ sūryagrāse akṣobhyena
pīṣayet | piṣṭvā parasuṃ saṃskaret | tam pādenākramya mantraṃ japet | oṁ vajrakuṭhāra pāṭaya pāṭaya hūṁ hūṁ hūṁ phaṭ svāhā | koṭiñ japya tilakaṃ vandayet | yam avalagati sa sphuṭa
ti || || devatāsphāṭanavidhiḥ || ||

na bhrūṁ hūṁ 3 phaṭ svāhā || ayutajāpena sidhyati |

madyam udgiratukāmena sādhyasya nābhau maṅkāram bhāvayet | maṅkāraniṣpannaṃ madyodaraṃ vibhāvayet | vāntiṃ kurvantaṃ dṛṣyate madya
m udgirati |

vandya mantraṃ japet | oṁ amukī me vaśībhavatu hrīḥ svāhā || ayutenāgacchati |

dhiḥ || ||

div.p: mantrapaṭala dvitīyaḥ || ||

lg.l:
prathamaṃ bhā
vayet maitrī dvitīye karuṇāṃ vibhāvayet |
tasmāt punar api śūnyatābodhiṃ dvitīyaṃ bījasaṃgrahaṃ |

tṛtīyaṃ bijaniṣpa
ttiś caturthaṃ nyāsam akṣaraṃ ||

prathamam bhāvaye
t mṛtakaṃ dharmmadhātvātmakaṃ viduḥ |

athavā nīlāruṇābhañ ca bhāva
yec chradhayā khalu |

vettālī vāriha
stā ca bhaiṣajyaṃ dhartti ghasmarī
pukkasī vajrahastā ca śabarī rasadharī tathā
caṇḍālī ḍamarukaṃ vādayed || etābhiḥ pūjyate prabhuḥ |

ca
ṇḍāli kālimārttaṇḍa bījaṃ madhyagatam bhavet |
sa eva satvam ity āhuḥ paramānandasvabhāvakaṃ |

saṃhāryānayed dhṛdaye yogī dve
ṣātmako bhavat |
cakra kuṇḍala kaṇṭhī ca haste rucaka mekhalā
vāme vajrakapālañ ca khaṭvāṅgañ cāpi vāmataḥ |

div.p:
caturbhujaṃ caturmmāranirjitaviśuddhiḥ | pūrvoktarūpavarṇṇakṛtahūṁbhava | prathamavāmabhuje narakapālaṃ devāsurāṇāṃ devāsurāṇāṃ raktena pūritaṃ
prathamadakṣiṇabhuje vajraṃ śeṣabhujābhyāṃ prajñāliṅgitaṃ vajravārāhī prajñā bhagavadrūpiṇī |

ṣaḍbhujaṃ trimukhaṃ vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇa candrāruṇābhaṃ | prathamam urdhvaṃ nīlaṃ nagnaḥ pū
rvoktavarṇarūpaṃ | bhujānāṃ pāramitāviśuddhiḥ | prathamavāmabhuje triśūlaṃ | prathamadakṣiṇabhuje vajraṃ | vāmadvitīyabhuje ghaṇṭā | dakṣiṇadvitīyabhuje kartti | śeṣabhu
jābhyāṃ vajraśṛṅkhalāsamāpatyā | yadvad bhagavān tadvat prajñā | savyāvasavye karttikapālaṃ traidhātukātmakamṛtakākrāntaṃ || ||
devatāpaṭalas tṛtīyaḥ || ||

devatā
bhiṣekapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
svahṛdi svabījān niścārya krṣṇadīptis tayā'ṅkuśākārayā traidhātukavasthitān buddhān ākṛṣyāṣṭamātṛbhiḥ | saṃpūjyānunāthyate | abhiṣiñca
ntu māṃ sarvatathāgatā iti |

tair buddhaiḥ herukarūpātmakaiḥ | pañcāmṛtāpañcatathāgatātmakaiḥ kalaśaiḥ pañcabhir abhiṣicyate | abhiṣicyamāne puṣpavṛṣṭir bhavati | dundubhiśabdo bdalati | ku
ṅkumavṛṣṭir bhavati |

rūpavajrādibhi staṃpūjyate vajragītyā locanādibhi stūyate || abhiṣicyamāno mūrddhāyāṃ svakuleśo bhavati | etena herukaniṣpannaḥ | trisandhyādhiṣṭhānabhāvanāṃ bhāvya uttiṣṭhet |
devatāmūrtyā sthātavyaṃ ||
abhiṣekapaṭalaś caturthaḥ || ||

atha tatvapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
svarūpeṇa nāsti vai rūpaṃ na śabdo nāpi srotā ca
na gandho nāpi ghrātā ca na raso
nāpi nāpi rāsakaḥ |
na sparśo nāpi spaṣṭā ca | na cittaṃ nāpi caittikaṃ |

lg.l: jananī bhaginī caiva pūjayed yogavit sadā |
naṭī rajakī tathā vajrī caṇḍālī brāhmaāṇī tathā
sevitavyā prayatnena yathā bhedo na jāyate |
vajra padman tathā karmma tathāgata ratnam eva ca |

l.add: vajraṃ ḍoṃmbī bhaven mudra padmaṃ nirtti tathaiva ca |
karma rajakī samākhyātā brāhmaṇī ca tāthāgatī |

lg.l: nāsti bhāvaka na bhāvyo sti mantraṃ nāsti na devatā |
brahmā viṣṇu śivaḥ sarvo vibuddhas tattvam ucyate |
brahmā nirvṛrttito buddho visnātīti viṣṇum ucyate |

śivaḥ sarvātmani kalpāṇān sarvaḥ sarvātmani sthi
taḥ |
satsukhatvena tatvañ ca vibuddho bodhanād rate |
jananī bhaṇyate prajñā janayati yasmāj jagajjanaṃ
bhagivatī tathā prajñā vibhāgan darśayed yataḥ ||

raja
kī duhitā narttakīti ca kathyate |
guṇasya dohanāt prajñā duhitā ca nigadyate |
asparśā bhagavatī yasmāt ḍombī tasmān nigadyate ||
maṇḍalaṃ pādalekha syān malanāt maṇḍalam ucyate |

karasphoṭo bhavet mu
drā aṅgulyāmoṭanaṃ tathā |
tad dheyañ cintitaṃ yac ca dheyaṃ yasmād vicintanaṃ ||
pitari prāptañ ca yata saukhyaṃ tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayaṃ |
maraṇaṃ yena sukhenet tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate ||

tatvapaṭalaḥ pa
ñcamaḥ || ||

lg.l: kaṭyāṃ mekhalañ caiva pādayo nūpuran tathā |
ekavṛkṣe śmaśāne vā bhāvanā kathyate śubhā |

mā
tṛgṛhe tathā rātrau athavā vijane prāntare
kiñcid ūṣme tu saṃprāpte caryāṅ kartu yadīṣyate |
siddhiṃ gantuṃ yad icchāsti caryā tvaṃ nayā caret |
vajrakanyām imāṃ gṛhya caryāṅ karttun tu budhyate |

div.p: vajrakulābhāvāt sveṣṭadevatāyāḥ kulena kriyate | athavānyakulodbhavā bodhibījanikṣepeṇa saṃskṛtām gṛhya |

lg.l:
ya
di gīyata gītam ānandāt tarhi vajrānvitaṃ paraṃ |
tarhi vajrapade nāṭyaṃ kurute yogī samāhitaḥ |

mantraviśuddhyā sthitā gītā
narttanā bhāvanā smṛtā |
tasmāt gītañ ca nāṭyañ ca kurute yogī sadā sadā |
bhakṣitavyañ ca bhaiṣajyaṃ pātavyaṃ vāri nityatāṃ |
jarāmṛtyu na bādhed rakṣābhūtaḥ sadā bhavet |

cauryake
śakṛtā mukuṭī tatra hūṁbhava yojayet |
bhasma keśapavitrañ ca yogī vidhartti caryayā |

lobhaṃ
mohaṃ bhayaṃ krodhaṃ vrīḍā kāryañ ca varjjayet |
nidrām ātmānam utsṛjya caryāṃ kriyate na saśayaḥ |
śarīran dāna datvā paścāc caryāṃ samācaret |
bhakṣyabhojyaṃ tathā pānaṃ yathāprāptan tu bhakṣayet |

gamyāgamyan tathā ma
ntrī vikalpaṃ naiva kārayet |

śakratulyo pi yo daityaḥ
purato bhavati niścitaṃ |
bhaya tatra na kurvīta siṃharūpeṇa paryaṭet |

div.p: caryāpaṭalaḥ ṣaṣṭḥaḥ || ||

atha cchommāpaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
yena vijñāyate bhrātā bhaginī cāpi viśeṣataḥ |

vadanti

gocaram āsritāyāṃ

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te melāpakasthānaṃ | bhagavān āha ||
pīṭhañ copapīṭhañ ca kṣetropakṣetram eva ca |
cchandohaṃ copacchando
haṃ melāpakopamelāpakaṃ tathā |

lg.l: pīlavopapīlavañ caiva śmaśānopaśmaśānakaṃ || etā dvādaśa bhūmayaḥ |
daśabhūmīśvaran nāthaṃ ebhir anyai na kathyate |

div.p:
he bhagavan ke
te pīṭhādayaḥ |
pīṭhaṃ jālandharaṃ khyātaṃ uḍyāyaṇa tathaiva ca |
pīṭhaṃ puṇyagiriñ caiva kāmarūpaṃ tathaiva ca |

lg.l: upapīṭhaṃ mālavaṃ proktaṃ sindhu nagaram eva ca |
upakṣetraṃ kulatā proktam arbudañ ca tathaiva ca |
godāvarī himādriś ca upakṣetraṃ hi saṃkṣipet |
lampākaṃ kāñcikañ caiva saurāṣṭrañ ca tathaiva ca |

pīlavaṃ grā
māntasthaṃ pīlavan nagarasya ca |

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te divasāḥ |
bha
gavān āha |
pretapakṣe caturddaśyām aṣṭamyāñ ca tathaiva ca |

kṛpām utpādya yatnena māraṇaṃ kriyate viduḥ |

kṛpāhīnā na sidhyanti tasmāt ka
ruṇām upārjjayet |

div.p:
tatraivaṃ mantavyaṃ |
dinas tu bhagavāna vajrī naktaṃ prajñā vidhāyate |

nākāryaṃ vidyate kiñcin nābhakṣyaṃ vidyate
sadā |
nācintyam vidyate hy atra nāvācyaṃ yac chubhācchubhaṃ ||
yathātmani tathā sarve yathātdya tathātmany ahaṃ para
śrīkāram advayañ jñāna he iti hetvadiśūnyatā |
rukārāpagataṃ vyūhaṃ ka iti na kvacit sthitaḥ |

tathā ca pratyayaṃ putra andhakāre pradīpavat |
vinā tena na saukhyaṃ syāt | sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ |
tasmād buddho na bhāvaḥ syāt abhāvarūpo pi naiva saḥ |
tasmāt sahajaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sahajaṃ svarūpam ucyate |
karṇṇ toyaṃ yathā viṣṭaṃ pratitoyena kṛṣyate |
tathā bhāvavikalpo pi ākāraiḥ sodhyate khalu ||
yathā pāvakadagdhāś ca svidyante vahninā punaḥ |
yena yena hi badhyante jantavo raudrakarmmaṇā |

sopāyena tu tenaiva mucyante bha
vabandhanāt ||
viparītabhāvanā hy eṣā na jñātaṃ buddhatīrthikaiḥ |

eka eva mahānanda
ḥ pañcatāṃ yāti bhedanaiḥ |

bodhicittaṃ dravaṃ syāt dravam apdhātu
kaṃ mataṃ ||

kakkolake
na tu yac cittaṃ tat samīraṇarūpakaṃ |
sukhaṃ rāgaṃ bhaved raktaṃ raktir ākāśalakṣaṇa |

div.p: hevajraḍākinījālaśamvare siddhinirṇṇayo nāma dvitīyaḥ paṭalaḥ || ||

lg.l:
atha vajrī sarvatantranidānaṃ nāmopāyaṃ
yoginīnāṃ yoginīnāṃ kathayām āsa |
samvarañ cābhiṣekañ ca sandhyābhāsaṃ tathaiva ca |
abhiṣekāt jñāyate samyak ekākāraṃ mahat sukham ||
atha bhagavantaṃ vajrasatvaṃ yoginya evam āhuḥ |
evaṃkāraṃ kim ucyeta | ḍākinīnān tu samvaraṃ |

kṣaṇajñānāt sukhaṃ jñānaṃ eva
ṅkāre pratiṣṭhita |
vicitraṃ ca vipākañ ca vimarddo vilakṣaṇas tathā |
vimarddam ālocana khyātaṃ sukhaṃ bhukta mayeti ca |
vicitre prathamānadaḥ | ma | paramānando vipākake | e |

viramānando
vimardde ca | sahajānando vilakṣaṇe | aci |
ācāryaṃ guhya prajñā ca caturthaṃ tat punas tathā |

hasitaśuddhyā cārya īkṣaṇe guhyakan ta
thā
prajñā pāṇyāvāptau ca tat punar dvaṃdvatantrake |

pāṇibhyāṃ tu samāliṅgya prajñā vai ṣo
ḍaśābdikāṃ
śāstā brūyān mahāsatva gṛhṇa mudrāṃ sukhāvahāṃ |
śāstā tam ājñāpayati kunduru kuru vajradhṛk |
mudrāyuktaṃ guruṃ dṛṣṭvā stutipūjāṃ kārayed yathā |
yathā yūya mahātmāno mamāpi kuru tad vibho |
miṣṭānapānakhādyañ ca madanañ ca bala mahattaraṃ |

śāstā brūyāt mahāsatva dhāraṇī
yam mahat sukhaṃ |
ity evaṃ vadate vajrī śiṣya vīkṣya kriyācayaṃ |

advayaṃ dvayarūpañ ca bhāvābhāvā
tmakaṃ prabhuṃ |
sthiraṃ calaṃ vyāpya santiṣṭhet māyārūpīva bhāti ca |

p.l: atha sarvayoginīnāṃ bhaginīnāṃ mṛṣitvā vajragarbho bhagavanta evam āha |

maṇḍa
lacakraṃ kim ucyet | sarvabuddhātmakaṃ paraṃ |

lg.l: maṇḍalaṃ sāram ity uktaṃ bodhicittaṃ mahat sukhaṃ |
ādān taṃ karotīti maṇḍalaṃ mīlanaṃ mataṃ |

cakra ni
vahaṃ khadhātvākhyaṃ viṣayādīnām viśodhanaṃ |

prāṇinaś ca tvayā ghatyā vaktavyañ ca mṛṣā
vacaḥ |
adattañ ca tvayā grāhyaṃ sevanaṃ parayoṣitāṃ ||
ekacittaṃ prāṇivadha prāṇaṃ cittaṃ yato mataṃ |

yoṣicchukram adattañ ca paradārā svābha
sundarī |
ke punas te viṣayāḥ kānīndriyāṇi kim āyatanaṃ kaitamā skandhāḥ ke punas te dhātavaḥ | eṣāṃ kiṃ svabhāvaṃ ||
rūpaṃ śabdas tathā gandhā rasa spraṣṭavya eva ca |
dharmmadhātusvabhāvaś ca ṣaḍ ete viṣayā matā |
cakṣu śrotrañ ca ghrāṇañ ca jihvā ya manas tathā |

mohavajrādibhi
r yuktāḥ | ṣaḍ etānīndryāṇi ca |
indriyaṃ viṣayañ caiva indriyavijñānam eva ca |
svabhāvaṃ caivādyanutpannaṃ na satyaṃ na mṛṣā tathā |

div.p:
tad yathā kāṇḍañ ca mathanīyañ ca puruṣahastavyāyāmañ ca
pratītyākasmād agnir upajāyate | asāv agnir na kāṇḍe tiṣṭhati na mathanīye na puruṣahastayoḥ sarvākārataḥ parigaveṣamāṇa ekasminn api nāsti | sa cāgni na satyaṃ na mṛṣā | evaṃ sarvadharmmā yogino mana
sikurutaḥ |

atha nairātmayoginīpramukhā sarvavajraḍākinyaḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ gṛhītvā samayadravyañ ca bhagavantam vajrasatvaṃ pūjayanti | kunduruyogenānurāgayanti bāvayanti ca vajrāmṛ
taṃ rasaṃ |

lg.l: tataḥ paścād bhagavān tuṣṭe sati sādhiṣṭhāna darśayanti |

div.p:
a
tha utsāhaprāptā harṣaprāptāḥ sarvā devatyo dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya ye bhagavāṃs tenāñjalim praṇamya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śṛṇvanti ||

lg.l:
khānaṃ pānaṃ yathāprāptaṃ
gamyāgamyaṃ na varjjayet |
snānaṃ saucaṃ na kuvīta grāmyadharmmaṃ na varjjayet |
mantran naiva japet dhīmāna dhyānaṃ naivāvalambayet |
mitre snehaṃ na karttavyaṃ duṣṭe dveṣan tathā na ca |
pañcāmṛtaṃ guḍaṃ madyaṃ viṣaṃ nivya prasūtajaṃ |

kaupīnaṃ viśvavarṇañ ca mṛ
tacchārair bhūṣaṇan tathā |
puṣpaṃ pretālaye prāpya bandhayet mūrddhajam varaṃ ||
saṃndhyābhāṣaṃ kim ucyet bhagavato brūtha niścitaṃ |
mantreṇāpi caturṇṇāñ ca saṃndhyābhāṣa na śabditaṃ ||
vajragarbha vakṣye haṃ śṛṇu me cetasā |

madanaṃ madyaṃ balaṃ mānsaṃ malayajaṃ mīlanaṃ
tathā |
gatiḥ kheṭaḥ | śravaḥ śrāvaḥ | asthābharaṇaṃ niraṃsukaṃ |
āgatiḥ prekhaṇā prājña kṛpītaṃ ḍamarukaṃ mataṃ |
abhavyaṃ dunduraṃ khyātaṃ | bhavyaṃ kāliñjaram mataṃ |
gūthaṃ catusamaṃ proktaṃ mūtraṃ kastūrikā smṛtā |
svayambhū sihlakaṃ jñeyaṃ śukraṃ kapūrakaṃ mataṃ ||

mahāmāṃsaṃ śālijaṃ proktaṃ dvendriyayo
gaṃ kunduraṃ |
vajraṃ bolakaṃ khyātaṃ padmaṃ kakkolakaṃ mataṃ |

ḍombī vajrakulī khyātā |
naṭī padmakulī tathā |
svapacī ratnakulī khyātā | dvijā tāthāgatī matā |
rajakī karmmakulā caiva etā mudrāḥ susiddhidāḥ ||
āsāṃ śukraṃ bhaved vajraṃ pūjayitvā pibed vratī |

vajraga
rbha mahāsatva yan mayā kathitaṃ tvayi |
tat sarva sādaraṃ grāhyaṃ saṃdhyābhāṣa mahadbhutaṃ |
yo nābhiṣikto 'tra hevajre na vadet sandhyābhāṣayā

i
ty upadravacauraiś ca grahajvaraviṣeṇa ca |
mriyate yadi buddho pi sandhyābhāṣa na bhāṣate |
svasamayavidāṃ prāpya yadi na bhāṣatet idam vacaḥ |

div.p:
sarvata
ntranidhānasaṃdhyābhāṣo nāma paṭalas tṛtīyaḥ || ||
atha vajragarbhapramukhāḥ sadvajraḍākinyaḥ saṃsayaprāptā daurmmanasyaprāptā bhagavanta vajrasatvam evam āhuḥ || bhagavan saṃsayam apanayatu

lg.l:
caryāpaṭale
yad ākhyātaṃ gītaṃ nāṭyañ ca siddhidaṃ
tatra sandeho me varttate | kiṃ gītaṃ nāṭyañ ca kiṃ
tatra sandeho me varttate mudrya kasya mudraṇaṃ |

mantro
ddhāre ca yat proktaṃ nairātmādais tu bījakaṃ |
tatra me bhrānti saṃjātā kiṃ bījaṃ kasya bījakaṃ |

viśuddhi tāsāṃ kathayantu bhagavanto bhrā
nti me 'bhūt ||
ghaṇa kipīḍa ho vajjaï karuṇeṃ kiaï ṇa rolā
tahiṃ bala khajjaï gaḍhe mayaṇā pijjaï |

hale kāliñjara pa
ṇiaï dundundura vajjiaï |

niraṃśu aṅga caḍāvïa
tahiṃ ja sarāva paṇiaï |
malayaje kunduru vaṭṭaï ḍiṇḍima tahiṃ na vajjiaï ||

vajradharmmais tathā buddhai
r yoginībhiś ca mātṛbhiḥ |
gaṇarakṣā tv anenaiva ātmarakṣā tathaiva ca |
anenaiva vasaṃ loke mantrajāpaṃ tv anena vai
sādaraṃradaṃ gīyate yatra sādaraṃ yatra nṛtyate |
gaṇādhyakṣan tu puraskṛtya tatra ghrāṇan tu lakṣayet ||
lasunaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ gṛdhragandhan tataḥ punaḥ |
gomāyor api śabdaś ca bāhyodyāne 'pi lakṣayet |
āler ādi nairātmā vajrā āle dvitīyakaṃ |
pañcamaṃ vajraḍākī ca ṣaṣṭha pukkasī tathā |

śabarī saptamañ caiva caṇḍālī
aṣṭamaṃ mataṃ ||
caurī ekādaśaṃ khyātaṃ vettālī dvādaśaṃ mataṃ ||

sarvaseṣāṃ tyajed yatnāt
ṣoḍaśā na kalā yataḥ |
kapūraṃ kiṃ na vai tyājyaṃ sarvayoginīsambhavaṃ |
bhagavān āha || evam etad yathā vadasi ||
evam eva tu saṃsāre nirvām evam eva tu |

saṃ
sāred ṛte nānyaṃ nirvāṇam pratipadyate |
amī dharmās tu nirvāṇaṃ mohāt sasārarūpiṇaṃ |

amūḍha saṃ
saran suddhyā saṃśāre nṛvṛtāyate |

madanañ ca pā
yayet tāsāṃ svayaṃ caiva pibet tataḥ |
kakkolake bolakaṃ kṣiptā kunduru kurute vratī |

tasmin yoge samudbhūtaṃ karppūraṃ na tya
jed budhaḥ |
na kareṇa tato grāhyaṃ śuktikāye na śaṃkhake |
amṛtañ ca jihvayā grāhyam edhanāya balasya vai |
na sā dīrghā na sā hrasvā na caturasrā na vatulā
tasyām utpadyate yogī tasyāḥ saukhyaṃ bhunakti ca |
tayā sārddhaṃ bhavet siddhir mmahāmudrā sukhaṃdadā |
rūpa śabdas tathā gandho rasa sparśas tathaiva ca |

sadbhūtapratyavekṣā ca kṛtyānuṣṭhā
na saiva tu |

bhagavatā kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ samvaraṃ kathaya
sva me ||
yathā bāhyaṃ tathā'dhyātmaṃ samvaraṃ tat prakāsitaṃ |
tatra nirmmāṇakāya syān nirmmāṇaṃ sthāvaraṃ yataḥ |
dharmma cittasvarūpan tu dharmmakāyañ ca hṛd bhavet |

saṃbhogan tu bhuṃ
janaṃ proktaṃ | ṣaṇṇāṃ vai rasarūpiṇāṃ |
kaṇṭhe sambhogacakrañ ca mahāsukha sirasi na sthitaṃ |
yathā kṛtaṃ tathā bhuktaṃ niṣyanda iti śabditaṃ |
vipākan tadviparyāsaṃ karmmaṇy ape mahat phalaṃ |

vaimalya yoga
viśuddhi phalaṃ puruṣakāram upārjanaṃ |
sthāvarī nirmmāṇacakre tu nirmmāṇa sthāvaraṃ yataḥ |
samvidī sambhogacakre ca kaṇṭhe saṃvedanaṃ yataḥ |

mahāsaṃghī sukhacakre
ca mahāsukhaṅ ke sthitaṃ yataḥ |
nikāyaṃ kāyam ity uktam udaraṃ vihāram ucyate |
jāto bhikṣur dhvanan mantraṃ nagna śirastuṇḍamuṇḍitaḥ |
ābhiḥ sāmagrībhiḥ satvā buddha eva na saṃsayaḥ |

bhūmayo daśamāsāś ca
satvā daśabhūmīśvarā matāḥ |

div.p:
atha sarvadevatyo nairātmayoginīpramukhāḥ | tadyathā || locanā māmakī ca ca pāṇḍarā tārā cundā ca bhṛkuṭī ca parṇṇaśabarī ca adhomukhā ca evaṃpramukhā
ḥ | sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamā yoginyaḥ paramavismayam āpannāḥ | etān bhāvāna śrutvā mūrcchitāḥ saṃtrastā avanau patitāḥ | dhūnanaprāptāḥ | tān sarvadevatīṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃstauti vajrī pu
nar utthāpanāya

lg.l: khiti jala pavana huāsaṇa tumhe bhāïṇi devi |
suṇahu pravañcami tatva mahu jo ṇa jānaï kovi ||
svapnavata bhagavate vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvās tā jīvaprāptā abhūvan ||

div.p:
takaladvayātmakatantrarājaḥ samāptaḥ || || ye dharmmā hetuprabhavā hetu teṣān tathāgato hy avadat teṣāñ ca yo nirodha evam vādī mahāsramaṇaḥ || deyadharmmo yaṃ pra
vacamahāyānayāyina bhoṭadeśīyaśābhikṣusiddhasiṃhadhvajasya yad atra puṇyaṃ tada bhavatv ācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṅgamaṅ kṛtvā śakalasatvarāser anutta
ttaraphalāvāptayeti || || nepālasammat 409 | caitraśuklatrayodaśyāṃ maṅgalavāsare śrīśrīmahārājādhirāja anantamalladevasya vi
jayarājye śrīrājavihāre śrībhikṣubuddhaśrījñānena likhitam idaṃ ||
